more_content:
Bridal Essentials in Key West

In sunny Key West, wedding season is always out in full force. As a known destination for romance and weddings, couples come tie the knot every year in the southernmost city. At The Marker Resort we know weddings. Our resort’s traditional conch-style architecture is the perfect backdrop for wedding day festivities—not to mention the lush gardens and serenity pools that make for a most elegant rehearsal dinner. Wherever the ceremony is set in Key West, the reception and festivities always begin (and end!) at The Marker. Speaking of festivities, we know that any perfect wedding involves planning! Many couples come to Key West without knowing the area and local offerings as well as we do. Our on site wedding planner, Just Save the Date, will help make your wedding vision a reality. To ensure your big day is absolutely perfect, we’ve outlined some of the top bridal essentials—and where to get them—in Key West. 

In-Room Amenities 

Choose from a variety of offerings and packages at The Marker. For the big day, we suggest the in-room spa amenities courtesy of Key West Aloe. We recommend the Key Lime Salt Scrub for a bright and fresh pick me up and the Cucumber Under Eye Gel to de-puff and sooth any tired under eyes.  

Spa: 

Loved by locals and visitors alike, Prana Spa is an excellent way to destress before the big day. We’ve heard great things about Prana Decadence, a three-hour treatment that combines the best offerings of Prana Spa. It begins with a body polishing scrub, followed by a 60-minute deep tissue or Swedish massage. The experience finishes off with an ultimate foot treatment, followed by their Ultimate rejuvenation facial and shirodhara warm oil hair and scalp treatment.

Florist:

Milan Event Floral & Décor provides all of your wedding event needs, from table top décor, to lighting, to custom linens and drapes. What is most unique about Milan Event Floral & Décor is high-end yet highly customizable approach to weddings. With over 30 years of experience with clients such as Baccarat and L’Oreal, you’ll know you’re in good hands with this Marker pick!

Cakes:

To ensure your wedding cake is worthy of your beautiful, destination ceremony, head to Key West Cakes, who offers wedding cakes in an array of flavors and fillings. We can’t choose which flavor sounds the most delectable: lemon, coconut, key lime, or hazelnut. If you’re looking for an imaginative wedding cake, Cakes by Karol offers cakes ranging in flavors like carrot, Piña Colada, and margarita, to more traditional flavors. They even offer an assortment of buttercream fillings: vanilla, chocolate, almond, peanut butter. To top off the cake choose from sugar flowers, sugar bows, sugar shells, fondant drape, or fresh flowers from your wedding florist.

Make Up & Hair:

Every bride needs to be picture perfect on the big day. Whether you’re dreaming of Bohemian chic or a natural glow, Carrie Rene Natural Styling is our go-to stylist for the perfect wedding look. Their services cover make up application, skin consultation, spray tans, and even private yoga sessions, for a truly relaxed bridal experience.

At The Marker Resort, we want to ensure that your entire wedding, from preparation to execution is a stress-free experience. So kick back and enjoy a little sunshine and a cold margarita, we’ve got you covered!
